comments.text:
0:12 That guy driving the bus is Kim Seokjin aka Jin. Vocalist and visual. 
The omma and cook of BTS lol. Can't dance but his prettiness makes up for 
it. He's called the "Pink Princess" because it's his favorite color. For 
some reason TOP is his role model..??

1:00 Kim Namjoon aka Rap Monster. Leader and Rapper. Also a bad dancer but 
is good at making songs. Before debut he was in an underground rapping 
crew. I think the other members of the crew were supposed to debut with BTS 
but they didn't for some reason.

1:10 Is Min Yoongi aka Suga (pronounced like Shuga because he's sweet like 
sugar lol) Rapper and another song writer of BTS. Also in an underground 
rapping crew called D-Town (Daegu Town)

1:30 Jeon Jungkook (bias wrecker, be warned) Vocalist, dancer, rapper, 
maknae, you name it. Golden Maknae/Triple Threat and is as cute as frick. 
Debuted when he was either 15 or barely 16. G-Dragon fanboy who wishes 
senpai to notice him.

1:35 Kim Taehyung aka V, who is extremely funny and 4D. Very weird. Likes 
to stick out his tounge. Vocalist.

1:39 Jung Hoseok aka J-Hope your hope. Named a toy horse after him 
(J-horse) Underground dancer before debut. Dancer and rapper with hidden 
vocal talent but doesn't sing much. Funny and silly and like the only one 
who actually thinks of Jimin as an actual person. Also a song writer.

2:59 Park Jimin!! Vocalist and dancer (he says he's been dancing all of his 
life) He has really great abs and stuff. Gets pushed around and teased a 
lot by BTS (but not in a serious way though) and has a secret crush on 
Jungkook (he is around him so much jfc) Also a Taeyang FANBOY (waiting for 
him to scream 'taEYAnG OpPA'). Extremely short but he's actually the same 
height as Mark (I don't know what's going on here??????????????????)

All of these people are weird idiots but you will love them <3 Fandom is 
called ARMY. 6/7 of these boys have either wrote a song or have contributed 
to writing the lyrics to some song. (Jin helped write the lyrics in Adult 
Child, V and Jimin rewrote the lyrics to a duet they did covering a song on 
their Soundcloud and it was called '95 Graduation.' Rap Mon, Suga, and 
J-hope wrote countless songs for Bangtan in their previous albums, and I'm 
not really sure about Jungkook, but I guess not everybody can do it so 
easily.)

Okay, sorry for this long introduction but it will be worth it when you get 
into the fandom ;)

You really should not study something that you are not interested in. It's 
your life not your parents' life. You should do what makes you happy. When 
you wake up every morning to go to work, it should make you feel excited to 
go and be working in a job you love. If you do something you hate it is a 
big possibility that you could suffer from OK m depression later on. And 
when your parents die, then what? You're just gonna be stuck in this job 
that your parents wanted of you but they won't even be around to benefit 
leaving you stuck in sadness. The advise that my parents always gave me was 
"do what makes you happy. Even if for a moment we say we dont approve just 
do what makes you happy.because eventually we will come around to 
understand. And your happiness is very important."
